name: EBRA ivzw/aisbl
goal: EBRA is the association of the European battery recycling and sorting industry. We represent the interests of actors involved with sorting, treating and recycling consumer, industrial or automotive spent batteries (at the exception of lead-acid automotive batteries).
interests: Consumer Affairs, Customs, Environment, Internal Market, Public Health, Research and Technology, Trade
euInitiatives:
Activities around batteries in general:
1) Battery Directive and other related pieces of legislation
2) WEEE Directive and other related pieces of legislation
3) ELV Directive
4) waste framework diretive
4) European waste catalogue
Etc.
